testcase.name: To create the user entry with JSON data
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com' .......................... passed And path '/posts' ......................................................... passed * def getRandomValue = function(){return Math.floor((100) * Math.random());} . passed * def userId = getRandomValue() ........................................... passed And request {"userId": '#(userId)',"id": 102,"title": "sunt aut facere repellat provident occaecati excepturi optio reprehenderit","body": "Fifty"} . passed And headers {Accept:'application/json' , Content-Type:'application/json'} . passed When method post .......................................................... passed And status 201 ............................................................ passed
